structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Account and receipt to be given before distraint.
law.text: Every sheriff shall, upon request, deliver to the person from whom fees are demanded, or to his agent, an account stating distinctly every item of the demand, and offer to give a receipt for the same, before he may make distress therefor.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4573.
